about.intro2: I have a deep passion for words and pens.
about.intro3: Rocket League is my favorite video game of all time.

pens.title: Pens
pens.intro1: Whether it's a classic Parker Jotter, a special edition Montblanc, or even a humble but reliable Pilot G2, I always feel better with a pen and paper nearby.
pens.intro2: It started around the same time I began writing down my
pens.intro3: But it wasn't until my college roommate Austin gifted me a Pilot Metropolitan that I officially began collecting.
pens.intro4: Over the years, my collection has grown to include a variety of pens. From the smooth feel of a fountain pen to the dependable click of a ballpoint, every pen I own represents a chapter in my journey as a writer and collector. This page is a tribute to these cherished instruments and the joy they bring to my everyday life.
